ComicInfo.Title: Buddycount; If By Feat or Famine; The Green Dogū; Deadly Delivery
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Black, White & Green
ComicInfo.Summary: More of the hottest creators in comics share their takes on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and they’ve all got a green streak! From the sewers to the streets, four thrilling new standalone adventures told in black, white, and green from Javier Rodríguez (Daredevil, Defenders), Tyler Boss (What’s the Furthest Place From Here?), Mikey Way (Electric Century, Collapser), and TMNT veteran Gavin Smith!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-22 13:57:14. [CVDB1060336]
ComicInfo.Writer: Gavin Smith, Javier Rodriguez, Mikey Way, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gavin Smith, Javier Rodriguez, Nikola Cizmesija, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.Inker: Gavin Smith, Javier Rodriguez, Nikola Cizmesija, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Javier Rodriguez, Jeffrey Alan Love, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.Editor: Jamie S. Rich, Maggie Howell, Nicolas Niño, Thea Cheuk
